title: iMac G3 Exploration Sensation (1st Generation Bondi Blue) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: iMac G3 Exploration Sensation (1st Generation Bondi Blue) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: This first generation iMac G3 Bondi Blue has sat in darkness for years. Today, Krazy Ken saves it, explores the hardware, and uncovers the mysterious contents of the hard disk.  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #91 - iMac G3 Exploration Sensation (1st Generation Bondi Blue)  Krazy Ken is now on Patreon! Pledge now to help support the show and get an opportunity to be in the show's credits!   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  #KrazyKen #ComputerClan
